inputs.name: OctaneServiceConnection
inputs.label: ALM Octane service/server end point
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the the ALM Octane endpoint to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service endpoint of type 'ALM Octane'

inputs.name: WorkspaceList
inputs.label: Target ALM Octane workspaces
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of target Octane workspaces

inputs.name: CreatePipelineCheckbox
inputs.label: Create ALM Octane pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, a pipeline is created in ALM Octane. For versions 16.2.100 and higher, selecting the checkbox creates a pipeline, while clearing it prevents pipeline creation. Prior versions always create a pipeline, irrespective of the checkbox. Clearing the checkbox does not remove an existing pipeline.

inputs.name: UseFullPipelinePath
inputs.label: Use full pipeline path as a name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create a pipeline with the name of the full pipeline path. As the pipeline name in ALM Octane must be unique, use this option to differentiate between pipelines that have the same name. This value only applies to new pipelines. It does not affect existing ones.

inputs.name: PipelineNameCreated
inputs.label: ALM Octane Pipeline name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the new pipeline in ALM Octane. This value only applies to new pipelines and does not affect existing pipelines. Leave the field empty to use the pipelineâ€™s name in Azure DevOps, as its name for ALM Octane.
